customer.auto_tagging_enabled.description: Indicates if auto-tagging is enabled for the customer.

customer.call_reporting_setting.call_con.description: The call conversion action associated with the customer's call reporting setting.
Specifies if call conversion reporting is enabled for the customer.

customer.call_reporting_setting.call_rep.description: Specifies if call reporting is enabled for the customer.

customer.conversion_tracking_setting.con.description: The conversion tracking ID associated with the customer.

customer.conversion_tracking_setting.cro.description: The cross account conversion tracking ID associated with the customer.

customer.currency_code.description: The currency code associated with the customer.

customer.descriptive_name.description: The descriptive name of the customer.

customer.final_url_suffix.description: The final URL suffix used by the customer.

customer.has_partners_badge.description: Indicates if the customer has a partners badge.

customer.id.description: The unique identifier of the customer.

customer.manager.description: The manager assigned to the customer.

customer.optimization_score.description: The optimization score of the customer.

customer.optimization_score_weight.description: The weight of the optimization score for the customer.

customer.pay_per_conversion_eligibility_.description: The reasons for the failure of pay-per-conversion eligibility for the customer.

customer.remarketing_setting.google_glob.description: The Google global site tag associated with remarketing setting of the customer.

customer.resource_name.description: The resource name of the customer.

customer.test_account.description: Indicates if the customer is a test account.

customer.time_zone.description: The time zone associated with the customer.

customer.tracking_url_template.description: The tracking URL template used by the customer.
